---
engine: julia
title: A notebook for browsing images of the Complutensian Bible
---

## Overview

Select a book/passage reference, and read parallel passages from the four texts of the Complutensian Bible (Hebrew Bible, Latin Vulgate, Greek Septuagint, Aramaic Targum Onkelos).

## The notebook

- `aligned-texts.html`: [HTML version](./aligned-texts.html) (readable in a web browser)
- `aligned-texts.jl`: [Pluto notebook](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/neelsmith/complutensian-texts/refs/heads/main/pluto/aligned-texts.jl) (download and open in Pluto)
